name: Luna Rose
bio: Luna Rose creates ethereal soundscapes that transport listeners to cosmic realms. With her signature blend of ambient textures and melodic vocals, she has become a leading voice in the space-ambient genre.

name: Neon Waves
bio: Neon Waves is an electronic music producer known for creating immersive digital soundscapes. Their music combines retro-futuristic elements with modern production techniques.

name: Marina Blue
bio: Marina Blue's music flows like ocean currents, deep and mesmerizing. Her compositions draw inspiration from the natural rhythms of water and tidal movements.

name: Golden Hour
bio: Golden Hour captures the warm, nostalgic feeling of California sunsets in their music. Their indie-pop sound is perfect for road trips and summer evenings.

name: Cosmic Orchestra
bio: Cosmic Orchestra is a collective of musicians creating expansive orchestral pieces inspired by the vastness of space. Their compositions blend classical instruments with cosmic themes.

name: Storm Riders
bio: Storm Riders harnesses the raw power of nature in their music. Their tracks feature thunderous rhythms and electrifying energy that captures the intensity of storms.
